content.rendered:
Directed by Rajiv Dhingra.

Written by Rupinder Chahal. Rajesh Chawla. Rajiv Dhingra. Rajiv Dhingra. Balwinder Singh Janjua.

Cast Kapil Sharma(Mangat Ram / Manga). Ishita Dutta(Sargi). Monica Gill(Princess Shyamali Devi). Edward Sonnenblick(Mark Daniels). Kumud Mishra(Raja Inderveer Singh). Anjan Srivastav(Lalaji). Inaamulhaq(Heera). Rajesh Sharma(Sargi’s Father). Jameel Khan(Hakeem). Jatinder Kaur(Manga’s Grandmother). Vishal Om Prakash(Pehelwan). Roshni Walia(Nimmo). Naisha Khanna(Lali). Sharan Makkar(Manga’s Father / Kanshi Ram). Neeta Mohindra(Shyamali’s Mother). Ashok Mahajan(Heera’s Father). Pankaj Sabharwal(Manga’s Mother). Arjuna Bhalla(Sargi’s Mother). Sukhwinder Virk(Hakeem’s Wife). Harmeet Sangi(Manga’s Bhabhi). Swarn Singh(Mukhiya – Village Nakku Guda). Sukhwinder Chahal(Thekedaar (as Sukhi Chahal)). Jaswir Kaur(Heera’s Wife). Balwinder Begowal(Heera’s Mother). Kuldeep Sharma(Patwari). Amitabh Bachchan(Narrator). Maryam Zakaria(Dancer). Musa Muhammed Olayinka(Killer). Umang Dev Shukla(Sarge’s Brother (voice)). Yogendra Verma(Raja vikramajeet (credit only))

Language Hindi.

Producers Munib Saif Baig. Vikram Grover. Naish Khan. Bantoo Khanna. Kapil Sharma.

Production K9 Films.
